title: to section 3 of that Act, a draft has been laid before each House of the Oireachtas
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Technological Universities Act 2018
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Technological Universities Act 2018 

(Section 44F) (Appointed Day) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited technological university act 2018 (section 44f) (appointed day) order 2023

title: to section 3 of that Act, a draft has been laid before each House of the Oireachtas
heading: 2. The 1st day of November 2023 is appointed to be the appointed day for
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of November 2023 is appointed to be the appointed day for 
the purpose of section 44F of the Technological Universities Act 2018 (No. 3 of 
2018) and this Order.
text_norm: 2 1st day november 2023 appointed appointed day purpose section 44f technological university act 2018 (no 3 2018) order

title: to section 3 of that Act, a draft has been laid before each House of the Oireachtas
heading: 3. On the appointed day referred to in Article 2, the business and operation
text_raw:
3. On the appointed day referred to in Article 2, the business and operation 

of the following applicant higher education provider - 

(a) 

in the English language, St. Angela’s College, Sligo, 

(b) 

in the Irish language, Coláiste San Aingeal, Sligeach, 

shall become and form part of the following applicant technological university - 

(i) 

in the English language, Atlantic Technological University, 

(ii) 

the Irish 

in 
Atlantaigh. 

language, Ollscoil Teicneolaíochta an 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

5 July, 2023. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 7th July, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [356] 3
